content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <OpenSearchDescription xmlns="http://a9.com/-/spec/opensearch/1.1/">  <ShortName>LEO Fra-Deu</ShortName>  <Description>Verwenden Sie LEOs Franz\ufffd\ufffdsisch-Deutsch Online W\ufffd\ufffdrterbuch um einzelne W\ufffd\ufffdrter oder Phrasen vom Franz\ufffd\ufffdsischen ins Deutsche (oder umgekehrt) zu \ufffd\ufffdbersetzen.</Description>  <Image height="16" width="16" type="image/x-icon">http://dict.leo.org/img/favicons/frde.ico</Image>  <Url type="text/html" template="http://dict.leo.org/frde?lang=de&search={searchTerms}"/>  <Url type="application/x-suggestions+json" template="http://dict.leo.org/dictQuery/m-query/conf/frde/query.conf/strlist.json?q={searchTerms}&sort=PLa&shortQuery&noDescription&noQueryURLs"/>  <Url type="application/opensearchdescription+xml" rel="self" template="http://dict.leo.org/pages/helpers/shared/searches/opensearch_frde_de.xml" />  <Contact>dict@leo.org</Contact>  <Tags>LEO dictionnaire w\ufffd\ufffdrterbuch online traduire \ufffd\ufffdbersetzen traduction \ufffd\ufffdbersetzung allemand fran\ufffd\ufffdais deutsch franz\ufffd\ufffdsisch</Tags>  <LongName>LEOs Franz\ufffd\ufffdsisch-Deutsch Online W\ufffd\ufffdrterbuch</LongName>  <Query role="example" searchTerms="plan"/>  <Developer>LEO GmbH</Developer>  <Attribution>Copyright LEO GmbH</Attribution>  <SyndicationRight>private</SyndicationRight>  <AdultContent>false</AdultContent>  <InputEncoding>UTF-8</InputEncoding>  <OutputEncoding>UTF-8</OutputEncoding> </OpenSearchDescription>
